attributes.additional_details: Any politician or there spouse who are jointly worth more than a million pounds should not claim a pension out of the public purse....if politics is ever to be seen as transparent and fair this will go along way to be seen as trying to do so...or stop all pensions for mps and allow them to make there own arrangements for a pension and claim the same as a admin worker in a civil service job if they wish to top it up themselves fine.and all pensions and contributions should be made public so we know and can judge either way.
